reviews.subject: Introduction to Computer Science
reviews.review: Great professor! Makes complex topics easy to understand, but the exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable, but her lectures are hard to follow and the grading is strict.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Amazing teacher! Clear explanations and very approachable for extra help.

reviews.subject: Modern History
reviews.review: Good lectures, but relies heavily on textbook reading. Not very engaging.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but he provides plenty of resources and is very helpful.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Lectures are boring and repetitive. Doesn't seem interested in teaching.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer with a passion for the subject. Makes physics fun!

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Encourages creativity but gives vague feedback on assignments.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures and fair grading. A good choice for an intro course.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Course is disorganized and lectures lack depth. Labs are better.

reviews.subject: American Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about literature and fosters great class discussions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Informative and enthusiastic, but the workload is heavy.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Philosophy
reviews.review: Monotonous lectures, and the exams are very difficult.

reviews.subject: Statistics for Social Sciences
reviews.review: Good explanations, but moves through material too quickly.

reviews.subject: World Politics
reviews.review: Engaging, knowledgeable, and presents a balanced view of global issues.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Art History
reviews.review: Slides are outdated, and the class lacks structure.

reviews.subject: Data Structures and Algorithms
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding. He is always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Decent lectures, but the exams are more challenging than expected.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: Very thorough and passionate about the subject. Excellent lab sessions.

reviews.subject: Linear Algebra
reviews.review: Material is not well-organized, and the pace is too fast.
